name: pinned-sidebar-panel
description: Spicetify extension to auto-restore a chosen sidebar panel.

scripts.deploy: npm run copy && spicetify config extensions pinned-sidebar-panel.js && spicetify apply
scripts.deploy-dist: npm run build && npm run copy-dist && spicetify config extensions pinned-sidebar-panel.js && spicetify apply
scripts.local: npm run clean && npm run build && npm run deploy-dist
scripts.undeploy: rm -f `spicetify path userdata`/Extensions/pinned-sidebar-panel.js && spicetify config extensions pinned-sidebar-panel.js- && spicetify apply

author: Bojan Raic
